categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Val Isa was a female who served as a Jedi Master in the Jedi Order. Isa was notorious among the Jedi for repeatedly deciding to learn other aspects of the Force, therefore becoming a Padawan multiple times. She was also known for testing the patience of her Jedi Knights with obvious questions, but occasionally stumbled upon rare and hidden wisdom that enlightened both her and her masters.

Val Isa was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Val Isa was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "Lessons from the Past," an introductory adventure published in the 2015 Core Rulebook of Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying game system.
